name: Dust Unto Dawn
description:
A fun, short little game to help people pass the time. This is my first game, so I hope you have fun!

Edit: The game may be pulled down at any point to address glitches that have come to light. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, and I hope you all understand.

If you have questions or encounter glitches, please feel free to get a hold of me at my business email PendygraftRA@gmail.com.
